entry.RedBlue: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
entry.Yellow: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.
entry.Gold: An underpowered, pathetic POKéMON. It may jump high on rare occasions, but never more than seven feet.
entry.Silver: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like PIDGEOTTO to catch it mid-jump.
entry.Crystal: This weak and pathetic POKéMON gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.
entry.Ruby: MAGIKARP is a pathetic excuse for a POKéMON that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.
entry.Sapphire: MAGIKARP is virtually useless in battle as it can only splash around. As a result, it is considered to be weak. However, it is actually a very hardy POKéMON that can survive in any body of water no matter how polluted it is.
entry.FireRed: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic POKéMON in the world.
entry.LeafGreen: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
entry.Emerald: Its swimming muscles are weak, so it is easily washed away by currents. In places where water pools, you can see many MAGIKARP deposited there by the flow.
entry.Diamond: It is said to be the world’s weakest Pokémon. No one knows why it has managed to survive.
entry.Pearl: It is unable to swim against even slow-moving currents. It always splashes about for some reason.
entry.Platinum: A MAGIKARP living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.
entry.HeartGold: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions, but usually not more than seven feet.
entry.SoulSilver: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like PIDGEOTTO to catch it mid-jump.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A Magikarp living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.
entry.X: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.
entry.Y: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
entry.Omega Ruby: Magikarp is a pathetic excuse for a Pokémon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Magikarp is virtually useless in battle as it can only splash around. As a result, it is considered to be weak. However, it is actually a very hardy Pokémon that can survive in any body of water no matter how polluted it is.
entry.Sun: Although weak and helpless, this Pokémon is incredibly fertile. They exist in such multitudes, you’ll soon grow tired of seeing them.
entry.Moon: Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side, many Pokémon enjoy longer life spans, thanks to Magikarp.
